text: Choledocystus is a genus of parasitic flukes, flatworms in the family Plagiorchiidae. == References == * Choledocystus pennsylvaniensis: life history. JJ Sullivan and EE Byrd, Transactions of the American Microscopical Society, 1970 * Considerações sôbre o gênero Choledocystus pereira & Cuocolo, 1941 (Trematoda, Plagiorchiidae). JM Ruiz; Revista Brasileira de Biologia, 1949 * Redescription of Choledocystus hepaticus (Lutz, 1928) n. comb., and the status of C. linguatula (Rudolphi, 1819)(Trematoda: Plagiorchioidea). JJ Sullivan, Proceedings of the Helminthological Society of …, 1977 == External links == * Category:Plagiorchiidae Category:Plagiorchiida genera
title: Choledocystus
